name: Funky Punk
description:
Funky Punk is a 2d Shoot Em Up game, mainly focusing on cooperative gameplay where player 1 and 2 shoots different coloured bullets. The goal is the help out eachother to destroy enemies with the same colour as your bullets. 

When playing singleplayer you`ve got the function to switch between the two colours on just a button press.

GAMEPAD IS RECOMMENDED!!

Funky Punk was made during 1 and half week att Forsbergs Skola (www.forsbergsskola.se).

My role:

Lead game designer,  Programming, "sound design"

The team:

Christoffer Clausen - Game design, Programming

Tobias Lundin - Art director, enviromental artist

Emelie Laatikainen - Artist, Enemy design, 2d animations.

Joakim Mannerstål - Enviromental artist,  graphic design, 2d animations.

Samuel Mårtensson - Character Design

Bernadetta Tajs - UI design, props artist.

Daniel Eriksson - Music
